PageTitle: segment-routing ipv6 best-effort (BGP-IPv6 unicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The segment-routing ipv6 best-effort command enables a device to perform public network route iteration based on SIDs carried in routes.
The undo segment-routing ipv6 best-effort command disables a device from performing public network route iteration based on SIDs carried in routes.
By default, this function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an global IPv6 over SRv6 BE scenario, the segment-routing ipv6 best-effort command enables a device to perform public network route iteration based on SIDs carried in routes.
